nodes.description: pineapple-shaped neon outline with a black base

graphs.instruction: Move the lamp and then the vase from the table in the living room to the shelves, placing them next to each other. The lamp has a pineapple-shaped neon outline with a black base, and the vase is simple and gray. The lamp was a gift from my best friend.

nodes.description: black laptop with a touchpad

graphs.instruction: Move the laptop and then the laptop stand from the living room table to the bedroom table and place them next to each other. The laptop is black with a touchpad, and the laptop stand is black with foldable legs. The laptop is my personal device.

nodes.description: white, 16 oz coffee mug, ACE Coffee Mug Kristen

graphs.instruction: Move the jug and cup from the kitchen counter to the living room table. Place them next to each other. The jug is red with a white dot pattern, and the cup is a white, 16 oz coffee mug, ACE Coffee Mug Kristen. The coffee mug is my favorite.

nodes.description: wooden lamp with a white spherical shade
black hand-shaped statue with a glossy finish

graphs.instruction: Move the lamp to the bedroom table. Move the statue to the living room shelves. The lamp is wooden with a white spherical shade, and the statue is black hand-shaped with a glossy finish. The lamp was a gift from my grandmother.

nodes.alias: souvenir dog statue from last vacation
nodes.description: gray dog-shaped statue

nodes.alias: colorful plant container from Cole Hardware
nodes.description: colorful assortment of electric pots

graphs.instruction: Move the statue and plant container from the living room shelves to the bedroom chest of drawers. Place them next to each other on the chest of drawers. The plant container is a colorful assortment of electric pots from Cole Hardware, and the statue is a gray dog-shaped statue. The dog statue is a souvenir from my last vacation.

nodes.description: white book with subtle yellow accents and a bookmark
pencil case with large white dots on an aqua background

graphs.instruction: Move the book and pencil case from the living room table to the chest of drawers in the bedroom. Place them next to each other. The book is white with subtle yellow accents and a bookmark, and the pencil case has large white dots on an aqua background, named Big Dot Aqua Pencil Case. The book has my favorite notes.

nodes.description: black vase with white geometric patterns

graphs.instruction: Can we move the candle and vase from the living room table to the bedroom chest of drawers? The candle is white with a light blue base in a round holder, and the vase is black with white geometric patterns. The black vase was a special gift to me.

nodes.description: wooden lamp with a white spherical shade

graphs.instruction: Move the lamp, vase, and picture frame from the living room table to the bedroom table. Place them next to each other on the bedroom table. The lamp is wooden with a white spherical shade, the vase is white with a narrow neck, and the picture frame is copper with a diamond pattern. The lamp is a gift from my grandmother.

nodes.description: black and pink running shoe, PureConnect 2
black and hexagonal dumbbell with a metal handle

graphs.instruction: Move the dumbbell and shoe to the shelves in the living room and place them next to each other. The dumbbell is black and hexagonal with a metal handle, and the shoe is a black and pink running shoe, PureConnect 2. The shoe is part of my favorite running gear.

nodes.description: gold picture frame with a dark central image
lamp with a pineapple-shaped neon outline and a black base

graphs.instruction: Help me set up some visuals on the shelves. Move the picture frame and lamp there. The book can stay where it is. The lamp has a pineapple-shaped neon outline with a black base, and the picture frame is gold with a dark central image. The picture frame holds a special photo of my family reunion.

nodes.description: keep laptop stand next to the laptop on the living room table for easy access during work sessions

graphs.instruction: Place the laptop stand on the living room table next to the laptop. I prefer to keep my laptop stand next to the laptop on the living room table for easy access during work sessions.

nodes.description: move picture frame and lamp to shelves to enhance visual appeal

graphs.instruction: Help me set up some visuals on the shelves. Move the picture frame and lamp there. The book can stay where it is. I prefer to have the picture frame and lamp on the shelves to enhance the visual appeal of the room.

nodes.description: keep the lamp on the bedroom table for reading and the statue on the living room shelves for display

graphs.instruction: Move the lamp to the bedroom table. Move the statue to the living room shelves. I prefer to have the lamp on the bedroom table for reading and the statue on the living room shelves for display.

nodes.description: keep jug and cup together on the chair in the living room for easy access when relaxing, and laptop on the table in the bedroom for work

nodes.name: chair
nodes.expression: on the chair in the living room

nodes.name: table
nodes.expression: on the table in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Move the jug and cup to the table in the living room. Then, place them next to each other on the chair. After that, put the laptop on the table in the bedroom. I like to have the jug and cup together on the chair for easy access when I'm relaxing in the living room, and the laptop is usually in the bedroom for my work.

graphs.instruction: Move the candle holder, candle, and vase from the dining table to the living room shelves. Place them next to each other on the shelves. I prefer to have the candle holder, candle, and vase displayed together on the living room shelves for a cohesive look.

nodes.description: arrange the lamp, vase, and statue on the bedroom table in a specific sequence for a calming bedtime atmosphere

nodes.name: bedroom_table
nodes.expression: on the table in the bedroom

graphs.instruction: Move the lamp, then the vase, and finally the statue to the shelves. Then, move them to the table in the bedroom and place them next to each other. I usually arrange the lamp, vase, and statue on the bedroom table in this sequence for a calming bedtime atmosphere.
